records.title: Brute Force Attempt
records.description:
This scenario demonstrates a typical Multiple Login Failure on an asset exposed to internet. 

Observe the following

* Fields of interest  (Source IP and Destination IP) are extracted as indicators (and enriched)
* Usecase Playbook (Investigate Brute Force) to illustrate step by step response plan
